寎字的基本解释

寎
bǐng
农历三月的别称。
睡觉多；老想睡觉。

寎
bìng
古书上说的一种卧惊病。

寎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bìng］
［《廣韻》陂病切，去映，幫。］
卧惊病。
[②]［bǐng］
［《集韻》補永切，上梗，幫。］
亦作“窉1”。
见“寎月”。

寎字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　寎； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页289第03
【唐韻】皮命切【集韻】陂病切，?音柄。【說文】臥驚病也。一曰多寐也。【爾雅·釋天】三月爲寎月。　又【廣韻】兵永切【韻會】【正韻】補永切，?音丙。義同。　【集韻】或作窉。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋歲】三月爲寎月。〕　謹照原書釋歲改釋天。
寎字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
寎字的起名意思

暂无。

nightmare
Basic explanation of words
nightmare
bǐng
Another name for the third month of the lunar calendar.
Sleep a lot; always want to sleep.
nightmare
bìng
A kind of lying convulsions in ancient books.
nightmare
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bìng］
["Guang Yun" Pi is cut off, go to film, help. ]
Lying fright.
[②]［bǐng］
["Jiyun" make up forever and cut, on the stem, help. ]
Also known as "窉1".
See "寎月".
nightmare
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 1] [Liu Zi Department] 　寎; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 289 03
[Tang Yun] Pi Mingqie [Jiyun] Pi Mingqie diseased,? Sound handle. [Said the text] Lying convulsions are also sick. One said more sleepy sounds. 【Erya·Shitian】March is the month of 寎.　[Guangyun] Bing Yongqie [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Make up Yongqie,? Yin C. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】Or make a slogan. Textual research: [[Erya·Shi Sui] March is the month of the month. 〕 　 I would like to change the day according to the original book.
nightmare

Name meaning
Nothing.
bìng
I сущ.
1) болезнь (вздрагивать во сне от испуга)
2) соня, любитель поспать; сонливый
II усл.
третий месяц (по лунному календарю)
